Keywords: Excalibur , Martial Artist , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Betsy Braddock
Special Powers
EXCALIBUR, MYSTICAL PROTECTORS: [Mystics TA], but only triggers during range attacks. Captain Britain has PROTECTED: [Mystics TA].
TELEPATHIC COORDINATION: Leadership. When Captain Britain uses Leadership and succeeds, she may also remove an action token from a friendly character within range with the X-Men or Excalibur keyword.
PSIONIC ARMING SWORD: Blades/Claws/Fangs. Once per turn, when Captain Britain uses it, you may choose to reduce the d6 roll by 1 or 2 (choose before rolling.) If you do, decrease the target's combat values by the same amount until your next turn.
